experiments.title: Exaggerated features
experiments.text:
For this experiment I employed an faceswap but always used the output as input again. After looping for around 160 loops, the original image got distorted and a exaggerated caricature. In this work, I delved into surrealism with exaggerated facial features, exploring the concept of emotion through distortion. The image echoes the style of Francis Bacon, presenting a tense atmosphere due to its stark contrasts and unsettling expression. The muted palette enhances the overall sense of discomfort and intrigue.
